---
title: History By Hash API
description: Get history for a single verified inference call by its hash.
openapi: get /v1/verified/chat/completions/{hash}
api: 'GET https://api.galadriel.com/v1/verified/chat/completions/{hash}'
authMethod: "bearer"
---

<ResponseExample>

```json 200
{
  "id": "0678511a-6758-778f-8000-54197a705ef5",
```

```json 422
{
  "detail": [
    {
      "loc": [
        "string",
```
